Activity: Log in, email check. Today: Bug fixing and game balancing.
Address the most critical bugs reported in the issue tracker. Prioritize bugs that affect gameplay significantly.
Investigate and fix any bugs related to player movement, such as collision issues or movement glitches.
Lunch break. Play a quick round of a competitive shooter to get some inspiration.
Balance the combat system. Adjust weapon damage, fire rates, and reload times to ensure a fair and engaging combat experience.
Test the game with the updated combat balance. Gather feedback from other team members to identify any remaining balance issues.
Implement further adjustments to the combat balance based on the feedback received. Log the modified parameters into the balance sheet.
Commit the bug fixes and balance changes to the repository.
